alert.note: Alert for Chase; Hayes; Lincoln; Perkins (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 1:25AM CDT until June 30 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Perkins County in southwestern Nebraska... Northeastern Chase County in southwestern Nebraska... Southwestern Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... Northern Hayes County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 200 AM CDT/100 AM MDT/. * At 125 AM CDT/1225 AM MDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Elsie, or 17 miles southeast of Grant, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wallace, Elsie, Dickens, Grainton and Marengo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
